subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson, ranked No. 2, and the two-time winner Anthony Kim, the youngest player in the field, will fire the first shots for the United States at the Ryder Cup.
snippet: Phil Mickelson, ranked No. 2, and the two-time winner Anthony Kim, the youngest player in the field, will fire the first shots for the United States at the Ryder Cup.
